Hydras:

"Yess, yess"hissed Hydras pleased while his eyes brighten with a sinester 
shine "Your idea, Maxima open me a lot posibilities, that need to be studied 
carefully... Perceptor has a good mind and he can find out the way to up 
grade the devise 'cause I remember kept the process to built it... Thanks to 
remember that, Maxima. That would be a good help... Even we can capture some 
maximals and forced to serve to Decepticon's cause"

>
>
> > "Yesss"hissed Hydras "Do you know my dear Maxima, that you have a high
> > vitues that every Decepticon leader want to see in his troops??? You're
> > cunning, you're brave, You're loyal... If I would have ten like you I 
>would
> >
> > had conquestered Cybertron... and Now I know that that it's possible..."
> >
>
>"There is always that possibility." The thought about the various warriors
>she knew. She was created to serve, to be loyal. But there was always
>something else.. something.. elusive. Perhaps something in her future.
>
>'If I remember correctly, Megatron attempted that. using a device called 
>the
>Robo Smasher. An interesting machine that warped the meta processors &
>circuitry of any cybertronian to his will. Such a device could still come 
>in
>handy. But.... alas.. it was destroyed."
>
>"Perhaps new warriors? With certain programming? You have the power Hydras.
>Whatever you ask, it can be yours." Her icy blue optics stared back at him.
>
>
